title: Preventable cardiovascular mortality (Northern Ireland)
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-of-health-northern-ireland
summary: Age-standardised mortality rate from cardiovascular diseases considered preventable for those aged under 75 per 100,000 population, Northern Ireland, 2001-2003 to 2021-2023.
description:
This dataset shows the age-standardised mortality rate from cardiovascular diseases considered preventable for those aged under 75 per 100,000 population, in Northern Ireland, for 2001-2003 to 2021-2023.

### Coverage 

Northern Ireland

#### Geography definition

Local Government Districts,
Nation (Northern Ireland) 

### Source

 - Northern Ireland: [Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency (NISRA)](https://www.health-ni.gov.uk/articles/health-inequalities-data-requested-during-202526) 


### Source Notes and Caveats 
- All figures up to and including 2011 are based on the 2011 Census mid-year population estimates.
- All figures from 2012 onward are based on the 2021 Census mid-year population estimates.
- This indicator covers the period since March 2020 and includes the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic.
- Rates presented are based on year of death registration, not year of occurrence.

measure.label: Age-standardised mortality rate for those aged under 75
